question: What is the total number of passengers who traveled between London and Paris in July 2024?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bp.passenger_id) AS total_passengers
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.airport dep ON f.departure_airport = dep.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport arr ON f.arrival_airport = arr.airport_code
WHERE ((dep.city = 'LONDON' AND arr.city = 'PARIS') OR (dep.city = 'PARIS' AND arr.city = 'LONDON'))
  AND f.scheduled_departure >= '2024-07-01'::timestamp
  AND f.scheduled_departure < '2024-08-01'::timestamp;
